pullrequest.title: Add visuals to the Apply Force/Torque dialog

content.raw:
Probably should have mentioned this in the last PR but I didn't try testing it: I can open multiple dialogs for the same model, is this expected?

In this branch, the rotate/translate/scale visuals for a model become visible in the normal way even when the Force/Torque dialog is open for that model. I remember it wasn't like this in the original PR. Is this going to be added later or are the RTS axes now allowed?

Been playing around with it for a while with many-linked models and seen no crashes so far, but I think I did see some strangeness with the Rotate axes disappearing permanently while the dialog was up. I'll try to see if I can reproduce that reliably.
